languages.text: "В Кровавой паутине я — Второй ткач. Подобного звания удостаивается лишь тот, кто сопроводит на другую сторону больше душ, чем..." {n}Кибелла осекается. Тонкие пальцы углубляются в свежую рану на руке, а затем чертят на губах символ, похожий на замок.{/n} "Нет большей нескромности, чем говорить о собственных деяниях. Я здесь, чтобы стать твоей тенью, а не хвастаться".

"I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only upon those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."
languages.original_text: "В Кровавой паутине я — Второй ткач. Подобного звания удостаивается лишь тот, кто сопроводит на другую сторону больше душ, чем..." {n}Кибелла осекается. Тонкие пальцы углубляются в свежую рану на руке, а затем чертят на губах символ, похожий на замок.{/n} "Нет большей нескромности, чем говорить о собственных деяниях. Я здесь, чтобы стать твоей тенью, а не хвастаться".

traits.locale_text: "I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only to those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

"I hold the rank of second weaver in the Bloodspun Web. It is an honour only bestowed upon one who has ushered more souls to the other side than—" {n}Kibellah breaks off. She dips her thin fingers into the fresh wound on her wrist, then paints a symbol on her lips that resembles a padlock.{/n} "There is no greater immodesty than to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow. Your shield to stop the blast wave. Your blade to parry the blow. If you choose to accept me, Enim'{name}."

"I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only upon those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

"I am the Second Weaver of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only to those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her wrist, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. If you will accept me, Enim'{name}, I will be your shadow. I will be a shield to protect you from the blast, and a blade to parry the blow."

"I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only upon those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

"I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only to those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

"I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only on those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her wrist, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

"I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only upon those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

"I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only upon those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

languages.text: « Je suis la deuxième tisseuse de la Toile de Sang. Ce titre n'est accordé qu'à ceux qui ont fait passer plus d'âmes que... » {n}Kibellah s'interrompt brusquement. Elle porte un doigt fin sur la plaie de sa main avant de peindre avec son propre sang le symbole d'un cadenas sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Il est honteux de parler de ses propres accomplissements. Je suis ici pour devenir votre ombre, et non pas pour fanfaronner. »
languages.original_text: "I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only upon those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis la deuxième tisseuse de la Toile de Sang. Ce titre n'est accordé qu'à ceux qui ont fait passer plus d'âmes que... » {n}Kibellah s'interrompt brusquement. Elle porte un doigt fin sur la plaie de sa main avant de peindre avec son propre sang le symbole d'un cadenas sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Il est honteux de parler de ses propres accomplissements. Je suis ici pour devenir votre ombre, et non pas pour fanfaronner. »

languages.text: «Soy la Segunda Tejedora de la Red Sanguinolenta. El honor de este título solo se concede a quienes han enviado a más de...». {n}Kibellah se detiene de forma abrupta. Se lleva un dedo delgado a la herida abierta de su mano y pinta una cerradura en sus labios con sangre.{/n} «Es deshonroso hablar de los logros personales. Estoy aquí para convertirme en su sombra, no para alardear».
languages.original_text: "I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only upon those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

traits.locale_text: «Soy la Segunda Tejedora de la Red Sanguinolenta. El honor de este título solo se concede a quienes han enviado a más de...». {n}Kibellah se detiene de forma abrupta. Se lleva un dedo delgado a la herida abierta de su mano y pinta una cerradura en sus labios con sangre.{/n} «Es deshonroso hablar de los logros personales. Estoy aquí para convertirme en su sombra, no para alardear».

languages.text: “我是织血罗网的次席织网者，只有将无数灵魂送往彼岸的人，才能获得这样的殊荣——”{n}绮贝菈突然停了下来，纤细的手指触碰着手上新的伤口，用鲜血在嘴唇上画了个锁的符号。{/n}“谈论自己的行为是可耻的。我来这里，是为了成为你的影子，不是为了吹嘘我的功绩。”
languages.original_text: "I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only upon those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

traits.locale_text: “我是织血罗网的次席织网者，只有将无数灵魂送往彼岸的人，才能获得这样的殊荣——”{n}绮贝菈突然停了下来，纤细的手指触碰着手上新的伤口，用鲜血在嘴唇上画了个锁的符号。{/n}“谈论自己的行为是可耻的。我来这里，是为了成为你的影子，不是为了吹嘘我的功绩。”

languages.text: 「私はブラッドスパン・ウェブの第二の織り手。この称号の栄誉が与えられるのは多くの魂を導いてきた者だけ…」{n}キベラは突然中断した。彼女は手の生傷に細い指を触れ、唇に血で錠前のシンボルを描く。{/n}「自分の行いを語るのは恥ずべきことです。私はあなたの影になるためにここにいるのであって、自慢話をするためではありません」
languages.original_text: "I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only upon those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

traits.locale_text: 「私はブラッドスパン・ウェブの第二の織り手。この称号の栄誉が与えられるのは多くの魂を導いてきた者だけ…」{n}キベラは突然中断した。彼女は手の生傷に細い指を触れ、唇に血で錠前のシンボルを描く。{/n}「自分の行いを語るのは恥ずべきことです。私はあなたの影になるためにここにいるのであって、自慢話をするためではありません」

languages.text: "Ich bin die Zweite Spinnerin des Blutgesponnenen Netzes. Die Ehre dieses Titels wird nur jenen zuteil, die mehr Seelen geleitet haben als ..." {n}Kibellah bricht abrupt ab. Sie legt ihren schlanken Finger auf die frische Wunde auf ihrer Hand und malt sich mit Blut ein Schloss über die Lippen.{/n} "Es ist schändlich, über die eigenen Taten zu sprechen. Ich bin hier, um Euer Schatten zu werden, nicht, um zu protzen."
languages.original_text: "I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only upon those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı'nın İkinci Dokuruyum. Bu ünvanın beraberinde getirdiği şeref, sadece yeterince can..." {n}Kibellah lafını yarıda bırakıyor. Elindeki yeni açılmış yaraya ince parmaklarından birini dokundurup kanıyla dudaklarına kilit sembolü çiziyor.{/n} "Kişinin kendi başarılarından bahsetmesi ayıptır. Buraya kendimi övmeye değil, gölgen olmaya geldim."
languages.original_text: "I am the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. The honour of this title is bestowed only upon those who have ushered more souls than—" {n}Kibellah stops abruptly. She touches a slender finger to the fresh wound on her hand, and paints the symbol of a lock across her lips in blood.{/n} "It is shameful to speak of one's own deeds. I am here to become your shadow, not to make boasts."
